title: Does Local Honey Really Help Allergies?
teaser: Locally harvested honey has been gaining a lot of traction as a natural remedy for allergy sufferers. But does it work?
contentencoded:
Locally harvested honey has been gaining a lot of traction as a natural remedy for allergy sufferers. But does it work?

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Elana Gordon of WHYY in Philadelphia looks at what researchers say about this increasingly popular natural remedy.

  • Read more on this story via WHYY

Reporter

  • Elana Gordon, health and science reporter for WHYY. She tweets @Elana_Gordon.
